BCC.name: Branch if Carry Flag Clear
BCC.description: If the carry flag is clear then add the relative displacement to the program counter to cause a branch to a new location.

BCS.name: Branch if Carry Flag Set
BCS.description: If the carry flag is set then add the relative displacement to the program counter to cause a branch to a new location.

BEQ.name: Branch if Zero Flag Set
BEQ.description: If the zero flag is set then add the relative displacement to the program counter to cause a branch to a new location.

BMI.name: Branch if Negative Flag Set
BMI.description: If the negative flag is set then add the relative displacement to the program counter to cause a branch to a new location.

BNE.name: Branch if Zero Flag Clear
BNE.description: If the zero flag is clear then add the relative displacement to the program counter to cause a branch to a new location.

BPL.name: Branch if Negative Flag Clear
BPL.description: If the negative flag is clear then add the relative displacement to the program counter to cause a branch to a new location.

BVC.name: Branch if Overflow Flag Clear
BVC.description: If the overflow flag is clear then add the relative displacement to the program counter to cause a branch to a new location.

BVS.name: Branch if Overflow Flag Set
BVS.description: If the overflow flag is set then add the relative displacement to the program counter to cause a branch to a new location.
